  ---
title: "Code to output fishy map animations"
output: html_notebook
---

This set of R scripts reads in stream temperature estimates and outputs threshold animations for either CHNK or STHD stream extents
Created: 31 Jan 2018
Used for all watersheds and all years by changing the basin names and year paths 
Parameters for:
  CHNK Adult holding/spawning 18' mx, 1 July - 30 Sept (161-281)
  sequ <- c(1:66)
  i in:  2011 1:11, 2012 12:22, 2013 23:33, 2014 34:44, 2015 45:55, 2016 56:66

reset sequence before running
```{r}
  for (i in 61:72) #July 1-Sept 30 2011 1:12, 2012 13:24, 2013 25:36, 2014 37:48, 2015 49:60, 2016 61:72  #25:36 
    {
      
      j <- i-36  # 2011 i+24, 2012 i+12, 2013 i, 2014 i-12, 2015 i-24, 2016 i-36
      #namey <- gsub(paste0("T", var, yrPath, "_"), "", colnames(network@data)[j])
      
      
      
      filename <- paste0(otherOutPath, "graphics/", sprintf('%03d', sequ[i]), ".png", sep="")
      png(filename=filename, res = 300, width = 1500, height = 1500, units = "px", bg="black")
      
      u <- length(which(network@data[,j]>temp)) 
      k <- dim(network@data)[1]
      tryThis <- which(network@data[,j]<temp) 
      subRCA <- network@data[tryThis, "RCAID"]
      subLen <- subset(rca, RCAID %in% subRCA)
      percLen <- 100*(sum(subLen$LENGTH)/totLen)
      dispPerc[i] <- percLen
       
       table.out[i,1] <- yearPath
       table.out[i,2] <- namey[j-2]
       table.out[i,3] <- sum(subLen$LENGTH)
       table.out[i,4] <- totLen
       table.out[i,5] <- percLen
                         
      if(u< 1){
        fix3.colors <- rep("#0000CD",k)
      } else {
      fix3 <- classIntervals(network@data[,j], style = "fixed",fixedBreaks=c(0,17,18,25)) #change temp range for 
      fix3.colors <- findColours(fix3,pal=fish)
      }
      

      plot(network, col=fix3.colors, bg="black", fg="white")
      
      
    legend(x=grconvertX(c(0.84, 0.99), from='npc'),
             y=grconvertY(c(0.65, 0.85), from='npc'), 
           fill = c("#0000CD", "#C1CDCD"), title="8-day mean max", legend = c("< 18 °C", "> 18 °C"), bty = "n", cex=.5, inset=c(.1,0), text.col="white");

      
      title(paste0("Available Chinook holding and spawning habitat in the ", nameBasin,", 1 July - 30 Sept, 2011-2016"), line=-0.1, adj=.80, col.main="white", col.sub="white", outer=FALSE, cex.main=0.6, cex.sub=0.5)
      mtext(paste0("Julian Day ", namey[j-2]),side =1, outer=TRUE, line=-4, col="white", cex=.5)
      mtext(paste0(yearPath),side =1, outer=TRUE, line=-3, col="white", cex=.75)
        
      #change xlim
       tmp2 <- subplot(
        plot(sequ[1:i], dispPerc[1:i], type="l", col="lightblue", bty="n", ylim=c(0,100), xlim=c(1,72), xlab="2011   2012   2013   2014   2015   2016", ylab="", cex.lab=.8, cex.main=.85, main="Percent usable stream length", adj=0, line=.5, col.lab="white", col.main = "white", cex.axis=0.6, col.axis="white", bg="black", yaxp=c(0,100,2), xaxp=c(2011,2013,2)),
        
        x=grconvertX(c(0.0,0.3), from='npc'), 
        y=grconvertY(c(0.0, 0.2), from='npc'),
        size=c(1,1.5), vadj=0.5, hadj=0.5, 
        pars=list( mar=c(0,0,0,0)+0.1, cex=0.5))
        
      dev.off()
      
    }
```
